relation: The campus is very large and plenty of open areas and studying places. They have many different events through the year that offer food, games, and fun. The location is close to a lot of different places for entertainment.
They have a lot of different food areas and vending areas. They also have a lot of extra events were they have food available. Plus the area it is located in has many other food places available.

Each class is different. Most classes are average and good grades are easily obtainable if you do your work and attend class. You must be willing to work for it though, good grades are not going to just fall into your lap.
Make sure to sign up early for classes. Make sure to use all the resources that they have available to help you succeed.

This is a great college for students who are working or going back after being out of school for many years. They have classes all week and even some weekends and they also have evening classes and online classes. The college is beautiful and a great place to study and get work done.
pageTitle: Harrisburg Area Community College-Harrisburg Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {137152=I am a part time student who began taking classes summer 2012. I find the campus staff friendly and accommodating to the students. I also feel that the resources available at the campus are extraordinary., 370794=Shitty parking. Get there earlier than 8:30 if you want a decent spot., 387453=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 98196=I am currently attending this college online and will be going to the campus in June for my next class. So far with the online classes, everybody seems friendly and eager to help you with any questions that you have. If you have a question for the teacher, she responds very quickly and gives examples if needed.}
textBeforeTable: 07/11/2009 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 6 out of 6 people found this review useful. 1 person found it offensive. 1 of 104 Raylicia from Harrisburg, PA Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Campus Safety Lots of friendly security and plenty of cameras, very comfortable feeling Clubs and Activities Student Government- Gay Alliance- BSU and plenty more. Great for these types of students I am a parent and have received lots of help through Hacc's Keys program, daycare- study habits- budget planning and much more. What to do for fun I use the gym in my spare time or maybe some volley ball. Food and Dining Low cost great meals and a large variety on health meals Dorm Life Extremely pleasant ,respectful, clean and safe Academic Rigor This is a first semester for me and I have used all of the academic services available for students to achieve. Try them. Classes are very well paced. Tips for prospective students There are plenty of workshops, tutoring classes and academic advisers, to assist you in achieving the best grade possible. Even if you feel the need to just speak with someone all doors
